title: Lake Clark National Park & Preserve: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Social Media               Social Media        Join us to explore the park through social media. A. Kirby/NPS Photo            NEW! Lake Clark is now on Instagram Follow us at: https://instagram.com/LakeClarkNPS/           Find Lake Clark on Facebook Become a park fan at: https://www.facebook.com/LakeClarkNPS           Lake Clark Tweets Follow the park's Twitter feed at: https://twitter.com/LakeClarkNPS      Social Media Team There are real people behind all our posts and tweets on facebook and twitter. Meet the people behind the initials at the end of each post.
